pl.polsl.java.model

Class Polynomial

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.polsl.java.model.Polynomial

  • public class Polynomial
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a polynomial function. It has two components: one of them is an arrya list which contain the function coefficients and the other is the polynomial degree. Class has methods enabling to set and get those two components.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Monika Kokot

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> coefficients
      ArrayList of double's representing the coefficients of the polynomial
      private int polynomialDegree
      The degree of the polynomial.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Polynomial()
      Non-arguments constructor.
      Polynomial(int pDegree)
      Contructor which sets the proper degree and creates the coefficients ArrayList of a proper size (which is always an incremented degree).

    • Constructor Detail

      • Polynomial

        public Polynomial(int pDegree)
        Contructor which sets the proper degree and creates the coefficients ArrayList of a proper size (which is always an incremented degree). It fills this array with zeros.
        Parameters:
        pDegree - the polynomial degree that should be stored in this class component.

      • Polynomial

        public Polynomial()
        Non-arguments constructor. It creates an empty polynomial object.

    • Method Detail

        Returns:
        the polynomial formula placed in one Strng

               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                      java.util.NoSuchElementException

        public double getACoefficient(int index)

        Method used to set an exact coefficient from the outside.
        Parameters:

        index - index in the coefficient array of the coefficient we want to set
